content: this keyhole scarf/cowl is an easy knit you ll need to know cast on and bind off stockinette stitch yarn over and knit two together you ll use two strands of lang cashmere dreams held together one 319 yard ball will make one project dividing the ball into two 12 5 gram balls before you begin will make things even easier choosing two colors of cashmere dreams will produce a lovely marled effect with two balls you can make two cowls -- one for you and one to gift
